REST API controller that provides full CRUD operations for organization management with filtering capabilities. It serves as the external API layer for organization data access with comprehensive validation and error handling.

## Key Components

**Main Endpoints:**
- `GET /api/v1/organizations` - List organizations with optional filtering (category, employee count, contract status, search)
- `GET /api/v1/organizations/{id}` - Get organization by database ID
- `GET /api/v1/organizations/by-organization-id/{organizationId}` - Get organization by business identifier
- `POST /api/v1/organizations` - Create new organization
- `PUT /api/v1/organizations/{id}` - Update existing organization

**Dependencies:**
- `OrganizationService` - Core data operations
- `OrganizationQueryService` - Query operations with filtering
- `OrganizationCommandService` - Create/update commands
- `OrganizationMapper` - DTO mapping between layers

## Usage Example

```java
// Get filtered organizations
@Autowired
private OrganizationController controller;

// List organizations with filters
OrganizationsResponse orgs = controller.getOrganizations(
    "TECH",           // category
    50,               // minEmployees
    1000,             // maxEmployees
    true,             // hasActiveContract
    "software",       // search term
    "user123",        // userId header
    "api-key-456"     // apiKeyId header
);

// Create new organization
CreateOrganizationRequest request = new CreateOrganizationRequest(
    "Tech Corp", "TECHNOLOGY", 150, true, "ORG-001"
);
OrganizationResponse created = controller.createOrganization(request, "user123", "api-key-456");
```
